title: Loading & In-Game screen distortion
body: I recently updated my windows 10 and now my LoL is messed up. I tried re-downloading it, but it did not fix the problem. The problem is after locking in, the loading screen with all the players is all glitched out and can't recognize anybody or the background, but is still running. After the loading screen, everything in is distorted and glitched out as well. I need help to fix this problem, please. Thank you!

replies.body: When your loading screen is freezing, do you receive any errors?  There's been a recent issue with a recent Windows update, where the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been causing a similar freeze.  Disabling it may be able to resolve this.  If not, give me some more details and we'll work this out!
